note: Untwisted projectors verified against paper lines 200-203 (label projectors_untwistedFib, actually eq 2.18 not 2.7). P_1^(1) = (1/(1+xi^2))(id+xi*tau) and P_1^(2) = (1/(1+1/xi^2))(id-xi^{-1}*tau) match exactly. Idempotency, orthogonality, completeness claims are straightforward using tau^2=id+tau (eigenvalue xi satisfying xi^2=1+xi).
